scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd .. && node post-build.js
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.deploy:netlify: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npx netlify-cli deploy --dir=frontend/dist/browser --prod
scripts.deploy:firebase: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npx firebase deploy --only hosting
